title: Update Home page hero to promote the AI App Builder with striking colors and new headline copy

requirements.text: Update the Home page header/hero section to prominently advertise the AI App Builder using striking, high-contrast styling and the exact hero headline text: "SIDEHUSL AI, BUILD YOUR SIDE HUSTLE TODAY!"

quotes: Advertise the AI App builder on header Hero in steik8ng colors ,reading ," SIDEHUSL AI, BUILD YOUR SIDE HUSTLE TODAY!""

acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page hero, the primary H1 text is exactly: "SIDEHUSL AI, BUILD YOUR SIDE HUSTLE TODAY!" (including punctuation and capitalization).

The hero styling uses more striking/high-contrast emphasis than the current treatment (e.g., stronger gradient/overlay + vivid accent highlights) while keeping text readable over the existing full-width hero image in both light and dark mode.
The hero remains responsive and visually stable across mobile and desktop, preserving the current full-bleed background image approach and readability overlay behavior.

requirements.text: Adjust the Home page hero supporting copy and call-to-action buttons so the primary CTA clearly routes users to the AI App Builder page (/builder), while keeping all user-facing text in English.

quotes: Advertise the AI App builder on header Hero in steik8ng colors ,reading ," SIDEHUSL AI, BUILD YOUR SIDE HUSTLE TODAY!""

acceptanceCriteria: The Home page hero includes a primary CTA button that navigates to /builder.
All updated hero badge/subheadline/CTA labels are in English and align with promoting the AI App Builder (not job discovery).
Existing secondary navigation options (e.g., browse/submit) are not broken; any remaining hero CTAs continue to navigate correctly.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, and frontend/src/components/ui).
Keep the Home page hero as a full-width, full-size header image with an overlay for readability (do not remove the current full-bleed hero image pattern).
nonGoals: Do not add new backend APIs or modify Motoko canister state for this change.
Do not redesign global navigation or add new pages/routes beyond updating the Home page hero content and styling.
